summary: MAGA DOG - Alright folks, today's gonna be a yuge day! First, gonna sniff out some deep state squirrels in the backyard, gotta keep 'em out, believe me. Then, gonna patrol the neighborhood, make sure no fake news cats are sneaking around. After that, maybe a little nap, but only the best naps, folks, you wouldn't believe. And tonight, gonna watch my favorite show with the family, because Making America Great Again starts right here, right now, from the doghouse!
